project_name.justification: The authoritative metadata and the article title confirm the project name: 'North Peak Signs Definitive Agreement to Acquire Prospect Mountain Mine Complex in Silver-Gold-Lead District of Eureka, Nevada'.

company_name.justification: The buyer is identified in the first sentence: 'North Peak Resources Ltd. (TSXV: NPR) (the "Company" or "North Peak") announces it has executed a binding, definitive agreement...'

ceo_buyer.justification: The CEO of the buyer is identified in a quote: '"The Prospect Mountain Mine complex...will receive for the first time," said Brian Hinchcliffe, CEO & President.'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The company acquires an initial 80% interest with the right to acquire the remaining 20%, for a total potential interest of 100%. 'The Transaction involves the issuance of up to 8 million common shares of the Company in two phases – an initial tranche of 5 million common shares that acquires an 80% interest in the Property, and at the Company's discretion, an additional 3 million common shares to acquire the remaining 20% interest.'

primary_commodity.justification: The authoritative metadata lists 'Au' and the article title describes the project as being in a 'Silver-Gold-Lead District'. The company itself is described as a 'Canadian based gold exploration and development company'.

verified_article_link.justification: The provided text is a copy-paste of press releases and does not contain a direct link to a specific news article.

currency.justification: The currency is specified as US dollars for cash payments and exploration commitments: 'the Company will make cash payments of US$385,000 in total per year' and 'expenditures will total no less than US$1 million per year'.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The agreement includes three annual cash payments of US$385,000, totaling US$1,155,000. 'the Company will make cash payments of US$385,000 in total per year, for each of the first three years following completion of the Transaction'.

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction is structured with a number of shares and a price per share (via fallback), which takes precedence over a raw share value according to the extraction hierarchy.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The transaction terms are broken down into cash and share components, which takes precedence over a combined value according to the extraction hierarchy.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The transaction involves an initial 5 million shares and an additional 3 million shares to acquire the full interest, for a total of 8 million shares. 'The Transaction involves the issuance of up to 8 million common shares of the Company in two phases – an initial tranche of 5 million common shares... and at the Company's discretion, an additional 3 million common shares...'

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: The text mentions the issuance of 340,000 warrants but does not assign a monetary value to them. 'the Company will issue 340,000 common share purchase warrants to those persons designated by Solarljos'.

option_payments_raw.justification: No option payments are mentioned in the transaction terms.

issued_share_price.justification: The transaction terms mention the number of shares issued, but not the price. Using the last traded price as a fallback, as seen in the detailed quote: 'Last: 0.80'.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The exploration commitment is specified as a monetary value, not in meters of drilling.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The company committed to spend US$1 million per year for three years, totaling US$3,000,000. 'the Company will undertake to complete a minimum three year exploration program at the Property where expenditures will total no less than US$1 million per year'.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: As part of the transaction, the seller was granted a 1% NSR. 'on the Formation Date, Solarljos will be granted a 1% NSR royalty on mineral production from the Property'.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The property size is stated in the description: 'The Property is over 1,700 acres of high elevation lands'.

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit for the coverage area is specified as acres: 'The Property is over 1,700 acres of high elevation lands'.

resource_size.justification: The text describes historical mining and mineralization styles but does not provide a quantified mineral resource estimate. It notes, 'the Property contains very limited recorded drilling' and 'there has been no systematic modern drilling.'

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer's ticker and exchange are provided in the first paragraph: 'North Peak Resources Ltd. (TSXV: NPR)'.
